attributes.action: order Ministers of Parliament to be accommodated by the Armed forces when serving in the Houses of Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The ministers could have access to  security secure accommodation right now.The British Armed Services have accommodation blocks in all their camps.There are many armed camps in London. All these camps have 1st class officers messes for the ministers and lower rank accommodation for ministerial staff. This would be a sound low budget option.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
